attributes.action: give better help for people suffering anonymous callers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please liaise with the police and telecommunications industry to advise the public on what to do in the case of 

a) threats of violence and death
b) anonymous nuisance (silent) calls
c) etc 

More than simply ex - directory or hanging up ... I called the police but was told their helpline was only for emergencies -

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
